Question: With no major Southern state remaining, this person targeted New York, which had many delegates.
Hints: Born and raised in Arkansas, this person became both a student leader and a skilled musician.
In 1998, Kathleen Willey alleged this person groped her in a hallway in 1993.
This person was born William Jefferson Blythe III on August 19, 1946, at Julia Chester Hospital in Hope, Arkansas.
